Renderable - Class in Framework
The Renderable class provides all properties/behaviour to display a token in an Env3D simulation.
Renderable() - Constructor for class Framework.Renderable
Default constructor for objects of class Renderable All fields take on default values: token depicts a 'JavaFish', located at 1,1,1, facing left.
